name: modelibr
description: A modern 3D model file upload service built with .NET 9.0 and React

scripts.lint: cd src/frontend && npm run lint && cd ../worker-service && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd src/frontend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../worker-service && npm run lint:fix
scripts.format: cd src/frontend && npm run format && cd ../worker-service && npm run format
scripts.format:check: cd src/frontend && npm run format:check && cd ../worker-service && npm run format:check

author: Modelibr Team
